Question
========
If you can’t find Positron-specific instructions for something, what is the recommended next step?

Answerlist
----------
* Try the same solution you’d use in VS Code, since most tips work in Positron too
* Assume the feature isn’t possible in Positron yet
* Reinstall Positron before trying anything else
* Avoid searching for VS Code guidance because it won’t apply

Solution
========
Positron is built on the VS Code codebase, so many VS Code tips and solutions work in Positron and are worth trying first.

Answerlist
----------
* True

* False
* False
